name: navNote for Students
headline: AI-Powered Task Management for Academic Success
description: navNote helps students organize assignments, track deadlines, manage study schedules, and balance extracurricular activities with academic responsibilities.
keywords: student task management, academic planning, assignment tracker, study planner, student organization app

hasPart.name: Assignment Tracker
hasPart.description: Track assignments, due dates, and completion status with automatic prioritization.

hasPart.name: Study Time Optimizer
hasPart.description: AI-powered suggestions for optimal study times based on personal productivity patterns.

hasPart.name: Campus Navigator
hasPart.description: Location-aware task reminders based on campus location (library, dorm, classroom building).

hasPart.name: Group Project Coordinator
hasPart.description: Coordinate group assignments and track individual contributions.

offers.description: Free for students with .edu email addresses
